plans_onetime.text: You get: Builder lapel pin. Invitation to Tyee Builder annual meetup. Editorial reports. Priority Tyee event bookings and discounts, swag giveaways, and a whole lot of love from the Tyee newsroom.
You get: Everything in the previous level, plus the knowledge that your contribution could cover the entry fee for four access-to-information requests.
You get: Everything in the previous level, and a virtual high-five with Tyee editors.
You get: Everything in the previous level plus an equipment upgrade for one of our reporters.
You get: Everything in the previous level, and an imaginary group hug with The Tyee's newsroom.
You get: Everything in the previous level, plus an invitation to an annual dinner with Tyee reporters and editors.
